name: 2 Players Basket Shootout
description:
This is a very easy and casual 1-2 Players game.

"Pretty clean graphics, Simple Gameplay, Highly addictive game for a multi player game" - TheAndroidSoul

Challenge your friend to a friendly match of basketball!

If you're alone, no problem! Challenge the other 8 characters to unlock them! Each one of them are challenging and will provide you with non-stop addictive fun!

Shooter 
Shake off your opponent and shoot at a place where they can't reach you!

Defender
Stick as close as you can to your opponent and block!

Just don't tear the phone into two pieces!

Google Play - Download here
